snippet: President François Bozizé on Tuesday urged rebels threatening to enter the capital to lay down their arms and let him complete the last three years of his term.
abstract: Central African Republic Pres Francois Bozize urges rebels threatening to enter capital of Bangui to lay down their arms and let him complete last three years of his term.
lead_paragraph: President François Bozizé on Tuesday urged rebels threatening to enter the capital to lay down their arms and let him complete the last three years of his term.

headline.seo: President of Central African Republic Urges Rebels to Lay Down Arms
headline.main: Central African Republic: President Asks Rebels to Lay Down Arms
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: President Asks Rebels To Lay Down Arms and Let Him Finish His Term
